Name: Interactive Installation
Description: Research and development in interactive installation art, exploring the intersection of technology, space, and audience engagement.

Name: Internet Art
Description: Investigation of digital art practices that utilize internet technologies, web-based platforms, and online communities as creative mediums.

Name: Data Visualization
Description: Research in transforming complex data sets into visual representations and interactive experiences for enhanced understanding and artistic expression.

Name: 3D Modeling & Animation
Description: Advanced research in three-dimensional modeling techniques, animation workflows, and their applications in digital media and creative practice.

Name: Creative Coding
Description: Exploration of programming languages and computational methods as tools for artistic creation, generative art, and interactive media development.

Name: Digital Twins
Description: Research in creating virtual representations of physical systems and environments, enabling real-time monitoring, simulation, and optimization.

Name: Virtual Production
Description: Investigation of real-time filmmaking techniques that combine live-action footage with computer-generated imagery in virtual environments.

Name: AI
Description: Research in artificial intelligence applications for creative media, including machine learning, neural networks, and AI-assisted content creation.
